EmailTemplate.name: External Newsletter.2018-10-25
EmailTemplate.subject: The Evolution of Platforms, Patterns, and Frameworks
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
October 25, 2018 <[[https://content.pivotal.io/springone-platform-2018/day-3-keynote-allard-buijze-and-mike-koleno?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> The Evolution of Platforms, Patterns, and Frameworks Mike Koleno, CTO at Solstice, and Allard Buizje, Founder and CTO of AxionIQ present on event sourcing reference architecture at SpringOne Platform 2018. Watch Now <[[https://content.pivotal.io/springone-platform-2018/day-3-keynote-allard-buijze-and-mike-koleno?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <https://content.pivotal.io/videos/jumpstarting-digital-transformation-and-reducing-time-to-value-key-to-success-michael-dell?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter> Jumpstarting Digital Transformation and Reducing Time to Value Are Key to Success Michael Dell chats with Jeff Kelly on the Pivotal Stories stage to discuss the relationship between Dell and Pivotal, and how the two companies jointly deliver value to large enterprise customers. Dell also shares some of his biggest lessons learned over the last two years since the massive Dell and EMC merger. Check it Out <[[https://content.pivotal.io/videos/jumpstarting-digital-transformation-and-reducing-time-to-value-key-to-success-michael-dell?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts/when-you-re-doing-the-right-thing-people-want-to-help?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter> “When you’re doing the right thing, people want to help” For the season finale of That Moment, we’re talking about food—our relationship to it, how we find it, and what it provides for us beyond just sustenance. Listen In <[[https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts/when-you-re-doing-the-right-thing-people-want-to-help?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://benchmark.builttoadapt.io/questionnaire?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <https://content.pivotal.io/blog/pivotal-cloud-cache-adds-tls-secrets-management-with-credhub-to-keep-your-cache-secure?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter> Pivotal Cloud Cache 1.5 is now GA! Now that PCC 1.5 is GA, learn how the new update adds TLS and Secrets Management with CredHub to Keep Your Cache Secure. Take a Closer Look <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/pivotal-cloud-cache-adds-tls-secrets-management-with-credhub-to-keep-your-cache-secure?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <https://builttoadapt.io/a-ux-designers-guide-to-overcoming-imposter-syndrome-116446727f9c?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter> A UX Designer’s Guide to Overcoming Imposter Syndrome How designers in complex technical domains can quash self-doubt, wrangle tough problems, and deliver user value. Learn More <[[https://builttoadapt.io/a-ux-designers-guide-to-overcoming-imposter-syndrome-116446727f9c?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <https://content.pivotal.io/blog/a-day-in-the-life-of-a-product-manager-at-pivotal-cloud-foundry?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter> A Day in the Life of a Product Manager at Pivotal Cloud Foundry Zoe Vance, PCF Product Manager at Pivotal London, walks us through a day in her life. What's it Like to Work at Pivotal? <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/a-day-in-the-life-of-a-product-manager-at-pivotal-cloud-foundry?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://www.datadoghq.com/blog/pivotal-cloud-foundry-architecture/]]> Pivotal Cloud Foundry Architecture Get all you need to know about Pivotal Cloud Foundry Architecture with this detailed guide from DataDog. Read More <[[https://www.datadoghq.com/blog/pivotal-cloud-foundry-architecture/]]> Upcoming Events 10/30-11/02, Cloud Foundry Operator Training Course, Washington D.C. <[[https://academy.pivotal.io/confirm-course?courseid=EDU-1128]]>
